p: A similarity search for each sequence was verified using BLAST ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/). The maximum likelihood (ML) methods from the MEGA (version 5.0) program [ 46] were used to create phylogenetic trees. The reliability of each branch was tested by bootstrap analysis with 1000 replications. Clade with bootstrap values of 70% was considered significantly supported [ 47]. The sequences of Merrillia caloxyon were used as an outgroup. All DNA sequences were finally trimmed to 718 ( matK) and 713 ( rbcL) base pairs. The sequences obtained after removing the primers used for PCR amplification were deposited to NCBI-Genbank BankIt ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/BankIt/) under accession numbers ( matK; MH187239-MH187243 and rbcL; MH187222-MH187229).
